column4: If i have my window drive mounted on /mnt/something --- Are they aslo counted as part of my / space/
Any idea which folders can be taking too much of space?
Do i need to run some check?
as if linux is saying correct or something is damaged
My /var directory is 6.4 gb any reasons it can be so?
Damn it i installed Kannel and its log have been like 6.1 GB!
how can i uninstall some software?
maybe you are having a persistent error in some service or the kernel that is "spamming" the logs (filling them with the same repeated msgs)
Yes its the bearbox that was doing it!
just delete the old logs to free space and get rid of that software (or fix it so it does not spam the logs)
